ValidationRule.description: A Field Service Starter Kit package validation rule: The validation rule prevents the insertion of new records if the SFS Resource Type field is filled out but the Field Service users automation feature is not turned on.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(NOT($Setup.FSK_FSL_Starter_Kit__c.Create_FSL_Resource_From_User__c), ISNEW(), OR(TEXT(FSK_FSL_Resource_Type__c) == NULL, TEXT(FSK_FSL_Resource_Type__c) == '')), false, IF(AND(ISCHANGED(FSK_FSL_Resource_Type__c), NOT($Setup.FSK_FSL_Starter_Kit__c.Create_FSL_Resource_From_User__c)), true, false) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: FSSK Package: SFS Resource Type should only be used when the Field Service users automation feature in the Field Service Starter Kit Package is activated
